abstract: Thomas Chen, Jonathan Wu and Wilson Tang are among rising group of Chinese-American chefs aiming to create modern form of Chinese cuisine that is influenced by tradition and eschews bland and sticky form that dominates America; recipe for spicy Chinese mustard chicken wings given.
lead_paragraph: From cookbooks and childhood memories, and through trial and error, some are determined to begin a new tradition with the food of their ancestors.

headline.main: Chinese-American Chefs Start a Culinary Conversation With the Past

snippet: From cookbooks and childhood memories, and through trial and error, some are determined to begin a new tradition with the food of their ancestors.
